title: When downloading/syncing, the mail counter is off
content:
When retrieving/syncing mail from my imap account, the counter for incoming mail is always wrong, it says it is retrieving 4 out of 2 or 8 out of 1. Already tried the repair function, but that didn't help. Any ideas?

Thunderbird v. 115.14.0.
creator: bambilla

title: When rebooting my desktop, Meta dropped Thunderbird.  Now I don't have any accessibility.  How do I recapture my previous Thunderbird so as to have all my email back?
content: How do I recapture my previous Thunderbird so as to have all my email back? Thank you. Tim
creator: bpf19

title: Copied Thunderbird Profile from Windows 10 PC, pasted to Windows 11 PC - No email history or address book
content:
Copied Thunderbird Profile from Windows 10 PC, pasted to Windows 11 PC - No email history or address book

I followed the steps to copy the profile from the old PC and paste it into the folder on the old PC.

Thunderbird is using that profile, but there are no email history or address book.
creator: rayhayes
